TEXT.TITLE: SOONER DEFENSE <SOON.O> GETS CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Sooner Defense of Florida Inc said it won a 4.2 mln dlr contract from the U.S. Army Armament to build electronic proximity fuzes used in Navy five-inch gun systems. Reuter
